page.title: 12Leisure Activities
page.content: Target bowls and carpet bowls are very popular in the area. Both games are played indoors in the village hall on a carpet. Target bowls has a round target on the floor, whereas carpet bowls has a white ball called a "Jack" to aim at. Football is very popular in Springholm. It is played every night if the weather holds out at half past seven on the football pitch. On Wednesday nights the Reoch team come to practice. They are sponsored by Stan Wardrobe who owns Reoch pub in Springholm. The coach is George Hunter. Fishing and swimming is popular in the summer. Watching television is also popular if there is nothing else to do. More than half the families in Springholm have computers.
